title: Create a Responsive Card Grid
description:
Build a card grid that changes columns based on screen size.

## Requirements

1. Style the `.card-grid`:
   - Use CSS Grid layout
   - Single column on mobile (1fr)
   - 20px gap between cards

2. Style the `.card`:
   - White background
   - 16px padding
   - 8px border-radius
   - 1px solid #ddd border

3. Add media queries:
   - At 600px: 2 columns
   - At 900px: 3 columns

## Expected Result

1 column on mobile, 2 on tablet, 3 on desktop.

testCases.description: Card grid should use CSS Grid
